articles.author: Britney Nguyen
articles.title: India joins EU in mandating USB-C charging port on smartphones - Business Insider
articles.description: India is following in the European Union's footsteps by requiring mobile devices sold in the country to have the USB-C charging port by March 2025.
articles.content:
India will require mobile devices in the country to have the USB Type-C standard charging port by March 2025, Business Standard reported.
The Bureau of Indian Standards is setting standards for two … [+2709 chars]

articles.author: Mariyan Slavov
articles.title: Redmi K60 might come to Europe as the Poco F5 Pro, according to Polish leaker - PhoneArena
articles.description: According to a tweet from MIUI Polska writer Kacper Skrzypek (his track record is unclear), the Redmi K60 will be called the Poco F5 Pro when it is released in global markets.
articles.content: Furthermore, the series comes with a 64MP+8MP+2MP camera system and a base price of 2,499 yuan (around $359) in China. According to Skrzypek, the price in Europe will be a bit different, and the alle… [+692 chars]
